greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Leading term of Stirling's approximation to n!, sqrt(2*Pi)*n^(n+(1/2))/e^n, rounded to nearest integer.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..449
program: (MAGMA) R:= RealField(); [Round(Sqrt(2*Pi)*Exp(-n)*n^(n + 1/2)): n in [0..100]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 16 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
ext: Corrected and extended by _Hugo Pfoertner_, Jan 10 2004
